title: Client always starts to download game from beginning after internet interruption
body:
I really need to pause, I try to download the game it scans the files, stays about 5 min on scanning releaseManifest then it says its downloading 7 gb something then suddenly changes to 16 gb and starts downloading which is ok, but my net speed maximum is 120 - 150 KBps and it drops alot and when it drops the client starts scanning again and downloading from the beginning and never continues from where it stopped

Please any help what to do

replies.body: That sounds pretty odd if the client continues downloading but you can see the progress bar reset. We don't yet have a way to pause our client download or update, and it's unfortunate that you haven't been able to get the entire game downloaded in one go yet. Your pc might be having issues with it's permissions, and it's not allowing the downloader to properly install the files. Try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know how that helps!
